summary: This is an email chain from July 2020 discussing a female caller who contacted the FBI's ADIC's assistant, claiming to have spoken to the ADIC previously about the Maxwell/Epstein investigation and offering additional information. The ADIC denies having spoken to her, and the correspondence is forwarded to the case agent for follow-up.

persons.name: Shia
persons.context: Referred to by the ADIC's assistant as the Case Agent for the Maxwell/Epstein investigation, to whom the inquiry about the female caller is being forwarded.

persons.name: ADIC
persons.context: An FBI Assistant Director in Charge who, according to the assistant, has never spoken to the female caller who claims to have previously contacted him about the Maxwell/Epstein case.

connections.description: Shia is identified as the Case Agent for the investigation, and the ADIC's assistant is forwarding information to Shia on the ADIC's direction, indicating a supervisory or collaborative working relationship.

events.title: Female caller contacts FBI ADIC's assistant
events.description: An unidentified female caller contacts the FBI ADIC's assistant, claiming to have previously spoken to the ADIC about the Maxwell/Epstein investigation and offering additional information while requesting an arrest report.

keyFacts: In July 2020, an unidentified female caller contacted the FBI, claiming prior contact with the ADIC regarding the Maxwell/Epstein investigation and offering new information.
The FBI ADIC and his assistant both deny having ever spoken to this female caller prior to this contact.
The inquiry was forwarded to the case agent, Shia, for follow-up to determine the caller's credibility and the nature of the information offered.
